English: place in Hubei, the starting point for a major rebellion at the end of Western Han

d.f: `西漢~`末年~，`王~`匡~`等人~`曾~`率~`饑~`民~`聚居~`在~`綠林~`山~`一帶~`對抗~`官府~。`見~《`後漢書~．`卷~`一一~．`劉~`玄~`傳~》。`後~`遂~`用來~`泛指~`聚集~`山林~`間~`反抗~`官府~`或~`搶劫~`財物~`的~`集團~。

English: place in Hubei, the starting point for a major rebellion at the end of Western Han
